top_comments.comment: Why isn't Bannon indicted yet? Are you people too afraid, just don't care or you have too much money. This is all a bunch of hogwash I'm beginning to think that's total Washington DC inflation you childish little kids make me sick

comments_since_last_sample.body:
How did it go in Virginia with all this living in the past and waiting for a stale, pale, male to do the right thing in the DOJ? 

America - you have the representation you deserve. I'm enjoying watching the sun set on the arrogance and ignorance of the US.
